author: IGN
description:
Check out the Story Featurette for Roofman, an upcoming comedic crime drama movie starring Channing Tatum, Kirsten Dunst, Ben Mendelsohn, LaKeith Stanfield, Juno Temple, Melonie Diaz, Uzo Aduba, Lily Collias, Jimmy O. Yang, and Peter Dinklage.

Based on an unbelievable true story, Roofman follows Jeffrey Manchester (Channing Tatum), a former Army Ranger and struggling father who turns to robbing McDonald’s restaurants by cutting holes in their roofs, earning him the nickname: Roofman. After escaping prison, he secretly lives inside a Toys “R” Us for six months, surviving undetected while planning his next move. But when he falls for Leigh (Kirsten Dunst), a divorced mom drawn to his undeniable charm, his double life begins to unravel, setting off a compelling and suspenseful game of cat and mouse as his past closes in.

Roofman is produced by Jamie Patricof, Lynette Howell Taylor, Alex Orlovsky, Duncan Montgomery, and Dylan Sellers. Derek Cianfrance, Channing Tatum, Jonathan Montepare
title: Roofman - Official 'Story' Behind the Scenes Clip (2025) Channing Tatum, Peter Dinklage

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Reveal Trailer for Glowing Lamps, a side-scrolling stealth action game developed by Metsys Games. Players will enter a gangster-movie-inspired world to complete objectives, meet characters from all walks of life, and explore a 1990s Russia. Glowing Lamps is coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Glowing Lamps - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Even after turning 40 years old, Tojima Tanzaburo still seriously wants to be a Kamen Rider. Just when it seems like his dream may never come true, he gets caught up in a series of infamous Shocker-inspired robberies... Shibata Yokusaru, the author of Air Master and 81 Diver, presents a story about adults who love Kamen Rider a little too much, and start playing pretend... for real! Tojima Wants to Be a Kamen Rider premiered on October 4, streaming on Crunchyroll.

#IGN #Anime
title: Tojima Wants to Be a Kamen Rider - Official Trailer 2 (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss 'The Walking Dead' Collaboration Trailer for World of Tanks Blitz, a free-to-play MMO tank combat game developed by Wargaming Group. Players will be able to access exclusive tanks, camouflages, avatars, and more based on the hit zombie IP. The Walking Dead Collaboration event will run from October 9 through October 20 for World of Tanks Blitz for Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android, macOS, and PC.

#WorldOfTanksBlitz #TheWalkingDead #IGN
title: World of Tanks Blitz - Official 'The Walking Dead' Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description:
After defeating the Dragon Emperor of Bronze and Flame in his first year at Cassel College, Lu Mingfei now faces an even greater challenge: the Dragon Emperor of Land and Mountains. Joined by Cassel’s top Dragonslayer, Chu Zihang, and Xia Mi—whose rare A-Rank blood grants her formidable power—Lu embarks on a high-stakes mission to stop the ancient threat before it awakens the world’s doom. Dragon Raja II -The Mourner's Eyes- is streaming on Crunchyroll.

#IGN
title: Dragon Raja 2: The Mourner's Eyes - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Tune in on Tuesday, October 7 at 7am PT / Noon ET / 4pm CEST for a brand new games showcase from Spanish independent game publisher Entalto Publishing and independent Spanish developer GGTech! For those attending the BCN ame Fest in Barcelona, you can watch the showcase live, while checking out demos of the games October 10-12 at the event.
There are a dozen new and unannounced games that will be revealed during the showcase, so this is one you won't want to miss!
title: Out of Bounds Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Based on the manga created by Hiromu Arakawa (Fullmetal Alchemist), Daemons of the Shadow Realm is set in a world where certain humans command mighty supernatural duos called Daemons. It is the birthright of "the children who sunder day and night"—twins Yuru and Asa—to rule over these powerful entities. Separated from a young age and unaware of the truth of their birth, brother and sister must fight to make their way back to each other, claim their birthright, and save the world...
Daemons of the Shadow Realm will be streaming on Crunchyroll soon.

#IGN #Anime
title: Daemons of the Shadow Realm - Official Trailer 2 (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Years after the Fifth Holy Grail War in Japan, rumors begin to circulate that point to the emergence of a new Holy Grail in America. Masters and Servants gather in the city of Snowfield as a battleground begins to take shape. The curtains rise as humanity and its heroes take the stage, all while secrets and shadows precede another Holy Grail War. Fate/strange Fake will continue streaming on Crunchyroll in January 2026.

#IGN #Anime
title: Fate/strange Fake - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description: Watch the Demo Trailer for Father, a psychological story-rich horror game developed by Wetboxteam. Players will see the lives of a family living in isolation and under the rule of an unforgiving and stern father. Uphold the demands as the father himself to maintain sanity in Father, coming soon to PC (Steam) with a demo available now on Steam.
title: Father - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Steam Next Fest Demo Launch Trailer for Winnie's Hole, a turn-based dungeon crawler based on Winnie the Pooh, developed by Twice Different. Players will embody a virus in Pooh's body, tasked with mutating cells through deck-building combat gameplay. Winnie's Hole is coming soon to PC (Steam) with a demo available now on Steam.
title: Winnie's Hole - Official Steam Next Fest Demo Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Launch Trailer for Absolum, a fantasy beat 'em up action roguelike developed by Dotemu, Guard Crush Games, and Supamonks. 

Players will make good use of spells, melee-centric combat, and abilities across multiple stages to take the fight across the lands of Talamh. Absolum is launching on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Absolum #BeatEmUp
title: Absolum - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out 'The Haunting' Trailer for Call of Duty: Warzone & Black Ops 6, the latest entries in the first-person shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. 

Players will face nightmares of all kinds in The Haunting, a horror-themed experience for the season. Face off against the undead, Jason, the Predator, and more in The Haunting for Call of Duty: Warzone & Black Ops 6, launching on October 9.

#IGN #CallOfDuty #BlackOps6
title: Call of Duty: Warzone & Black Ops 6 - Official 'The Haunting' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Whether you call them Roguelikes, Roguelites, or just something similar to the 1980s dungeon crawler Rogue, this genre has a hotly contested definition, but in this Best Roguelike Games Ranked video, we'll be explaining our collection of the very best mix of procedural generation and permadeath-loving games. 

From Hades, to Vampire Survivors, The Binding of Isaac, Spelunky 2, and more, this bundle of picks is IGN's collection of favourites! 

#IGN #Hades2 #Roguelike
title: Top 16 Best Roguelike Games - Hades 2 Update

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Warwick Gameplay Reveal Trailer for 2XKO, the upcoming 2v2 fighting game developed by Riot Games. 

Players will experience no end nor escape when facing off against Warwick, a menacing and lethal opponent with fast, clawed strikes with plenty of pressure to deal. Fight as Warwick in 2XKO, available now in Early Access for PC.

#IGN #2XKO #FightingGames
title: 2XKO - Official Warwick Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Launch Hype Trailer for Battlefield 6, a first-person action multiplayer shooter developed by Battlefield Studios, DICE, and EA. Players will return to the battlefield like never before with more weapons, vehicles, maps, and more to allow for a new era of all-out warfare. Battlefield 6 is launching on October 10 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Battlefield6 #Gaming #IGN
title: Battlefield 6 - Official Launch Hype Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Last Frontier is a new original drama series from co-creators Jon Bokenkamp and Richard D’Ovidio, starring and executive produced by Jason Clarke. The 10-episode thriller will make its global debut on Apple TV+ with the first two episodes on Friday, October 10, 2025 followed by new episodes every Friday through December 5.

The Last Frontier follows Frank Remnick (Clarke), the lone U.S. marshal in charge of the quiet, rugged barrens of Alaska. Remnick’s jurisdiction is turned upside down when a prison transport plane crashes in the remote wilderness, setting free dozens of violent inmates. Tasked with protecting the town he’s vowed to keep safe, he begins to suspect the crash wasn’t an accident, but the first step of a well-crafted plan with far-reaching and devastating implications.
 
Alongside Clarke, The Last Frontier also stars Dominic Cooper, Haley Bennett, Simone Kessell, Dallas Goldtooth, and Tait Blum, with Academy Award-nominee and multi-Emmy Award-winner Alfre Woodard.
title: The Last Frontier - Exclusive Opening Sequence (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Sam Fisher may have been out of the spec ops game for a while, but he's still as quiet and deadly as ever in this exclusive scene from Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Deathwatch.

In this first-ever adaptation of the acclaimed stealth video game Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell, legendary agent Sam Fisher (voiced by Liev Schreiber) is drawn back into the field when a wounded young operative seeks out his help. 

Produced by Ubisoft, in partnership with Derek Kolstad (John Wick), Sun Creature, and Fost. 

Splinter Cell: Deathwatch launches on Netflix on October 14, 2025, at 12:00 AM PDT.
title: Splinter Cell: Deathwatch - Exclusive "Stealth" Clip (2025) Liev Schreiber

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer for Die My Love, a drama-comedy thriller distributed by Mubi starring Robert Pattinson and Jennifer Lawrence. Witness an intense and visceral portrait of a woman engulfed by love and madness in Die My Love, in theaters on November 7.

The film follows Grace and her partner Jackson, who have recently moved into an old house deep in the country. With ambitions to write The Great American Novel, Grace settles into her new environment, and the couple welcome a baby soon after. However, with Jackson frequently – and suspiciously – absent, and the pressures of domestic life starting to weigh on her, Grace begins to unravel, leaving a path of destruction in her wake.

Die My Love stars Jennifer Lawrence, Robert Pattinson, LaKeith Stanfield, Nick Nolte, Sissy Spacek, and more. The film is directed by Lynne Ramsay and produced by Andrea Calderwood, Justine Ciarrocchi, Jennifer Lawrence, Thad Luckinbill, Trent Luckinbill, Martin Scorsese, and Molly Smith.

Die My
title: Die My Love - Official Trailer (2025) Robert Pattinson, Jennifer Lawrence, LaKeith Stanfield

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Release Date Announcement Trailer for PowerWash Simulator 2, the sequel to the hit powerwashing simulation game developed by FuturLab. 

Players will explore an assortment of locations to clean the area with their trusty power washer. Become more effective on the job with new tools and equipment in PowerWash Simulator 2, launching on October 23 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #PowerwashSimulator2 #SimulationGames
title: PowerWash Simulator 2 - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Online Co-op Announcement Trailer for Vampire Survivors, the hit auto battler roguelite developed by Poncle. Players will soon be able to team up with their friends in Online Co-op Mode with up to 4 players total. 

Online Co-op Mode is launching with Version 1.14, coming to consoles and PC in Fall 2025.

#IGN #VampireSurvivors #Roguelite
title: Vampire Survivors - Official Online Co-op Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get your first official look at Cult of Blood, an upcoming fantasy survival horror game with old-school-Resident-Evil-style controls where you play a police officer investigating vampires who ends up discovering a secret village of worshippers in a blood cult. Play the demo now and/or wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3056650/Cult_Of_Blood/
title: Cult of Blood - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Early Access Launch Trailer for Seafarer: The Ship Sim, a seaport management simulation game developed by Astragon. Players will embark on a sea-centric journey to choose from a suite of different careers to tackle the open waters with an array of different ships. Become immersed in the game being built on Unreal Engine 5, fitted with lifelike wave physics and dynamic weather conditions. Seafarer: The Ship Sim is available now in Early Access for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Seafarer: The Ship Sim - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss your chance to see the Halloween classic on the big screen. Trick 'R Treat hits theatres for the first time nationwide in 4K on October 14th & 16th. 

Go to FathomEntertainment.com to get tickets now and to find the theater nearest you: https://hubs.la/Q03J2Q4g0
title: Trick ‘r Treat - Official Theatrical Re-Release Trailer 2 (2025) Brian Cox, Anna Paquin

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Trailer for ARC Raiders, an upcoming third-person extraction shooter developed by Embark Studios. 

Players will be able to head into the fray with top performance courtesy of NVIDIA. ARC Raiders will support DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation, RTX GI, and NVIDIA Reflex to indulge in all crafting, upgrading, and dispatching ARC machines in the open world. ARC Raiders is launching on October 30 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

Source: https://youtube.com/nvidia

#IGN #ARCRaiders #NVIDIA
title: ARC Raiders - Official 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Close to You' Short Film produced by Nintendo. The 'Close to You' Short Film explores the wonder and curiosity of a child at play with music cues to Pikmin and Rosalina throughout the film.

#IGN #Nintendo #ShortFilm
title: Nintendo - Official 'Close to You' Short Film

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Lethal Difficulty Gameplay Trailer for Ghost of Yotei, the latest action-adventure game developed by Sucker Punch Productions. 

Players can get a look at the lethality of Lethal Difficulty in Ghost of Yotei, calling upon players to use their arsenal effectively and ensure precise timing, as one wrong step can end the journey. Ghost of Yotei is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #GhostOfYotei #ActionAdventure
title: Ghost of Yotei - Official Lethal Difficulty Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Gameplay Reveal Trailer for Netbreak, an upcoming found footage horror game developed by Galactic Crows. Players will solve puzzles to find six hidden assets on the dark web to decrypt them and take down the underground SNUFF marketplace. Netbreak is coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Netbreak - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
